hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Auto-format with oxfmt after editing JS/TS/RS files
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')

if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  if command -v oxfmt >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    oxfmt "$file_path" 2>&1 | head -5 >&2
  fi
fi

echo "$input"

PostToolUse.description: Auto-format JS/TS/RS files with oxfmt after edits
